Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Votes.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Title: Relates to each agency designating a small business liaison
Summary: Provides that each agency shall designate an existing employee to serve as its liaison to small businesses regulated by such agency; further provides the duties of such small business liaison.
LawCode: Add ยง102-b, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to each agency designating a small business liaison
